name: @cheap-glitch/mi-cron
description: A microscopic parser for standard cron expressions.
author: cheap glitch <cheap.glitch@gmail.com> (https://github.com/cheap-glitch)

scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:minify
scripts.coverage:report: npm run coverage && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | codecov --pipe --disable=gcov
scripts.test:watch: nodemon -e js,ts --watch . --watch test --ignore index.js --exec 'npm run test || exit 1'
